mapper.select: SELECT apt_nm , land_area , land_no , road_nm , dong , eupmyundong_cd , sigungu_cd , trade_month , trade_year , built_year , payment , idx , layer FROM trade_real_apt WHERE 1=1 LIMIT 0,10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO population (yr_dt , mon_dt , area_cd , age , cty_nm , dst_nm , unit , man_cnt) SELECT yr_dt, mon_dt, area_cd, age, cty_nm, dst_nm, unit, SUM(tmp_cnt) as tmp_cnt FROM view_population WHERE itm_nm = '남자인구수' GROUP BY yr_dt, mon_dt, area_cd, age, cty_nm , dst_nm, itm_nm ORDER BY age DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE population a , (SELECT tmp_cnt , yr_dt , mon_dt , area_cd , cty_nm , dst_nm , age FROM view_population WHERE itm_nm = '여자인구수') b SET a.wmn_cnt = b.tmp_cnt WHERE a.yr_dt = b.yr_dt AND a.mon_dt = b.mon_dt AND a.area_cd = b.area_cd AND a.cty_nm = b.cty_nm AND a.dst_nm = b.dst_nm AND a.age = b.age
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(yr_dt) AS yrDt , MAX(mon_dt) AS monDt FROM population WHERE yr_dt = (SELECT MAX(yr_dt) FROM population)
